title: Understanding Your Rights After a Car Accident in New Jersey
excerpt: Learn what steps to take immediately after a car accident and how to protect your legal rights in New Jersey.

children.text: Being involved in a car accident can be a traumatic and overwhelming experience. In the immediate aftermath, it's crucial to understand your rights and take the proper steps to protect yourself legally and financially.

First and foremost, ensure everyone's safety and call 911 if there are any injuries. Document the scene with photos, exchange insurance information with other drivers, and get contact information from witnesses. Never admit fault at the scene.

seo.metaTitle: Your Rights After a Car Accident in NJ | Turuchi Law Firm
seo.metaDescription: Learn what steps to take after a car accident in New Jersey and how to protect your legal rights. Free consultation available.

title: Family-Based Immigration: Bringing Your Loved Ones to the United States
excerpt: A comprehensive guide to understanding the family-based immigration process.

children.text: Family reunification is one of the cornerstones of U.S. immigration law. If you're a U.S. citizen or lawful permanent resident, you may be able to sponsor certain family members.

title: Workers' Compensation in New Jersey: What You Need to Know
excerpt: Understanding your rights and benefits under New Jersey's workers' compensation system.

children.text: If you've been injured at work, you may be entitled to workers' compensation benefits. New Jersey law requires most employers to carry workers' compensation insurance.
